data.text: We came for a visit to Dubai and stayed at this hotel. It was nice to stay in this hotel and it was very nice to have breakfast in the restaurant. All the staff like Manisha ,Benita  this restaurant are very cooperative which makes us happy to stay here. We want to have such staff. Being Indian is proud for Indian so please do it for us. Thank you for making this visit very enjoyable.thank you üôè
data.title: Spice tree good experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for the valuable time to share your recent experience in our property. We are glad to know that our service was up to your expectations and that we could offer you a memorable experience. We have duly noted your feedback regarding our team members, and it will be conveyed to the respective Department Heads accordingly. We look forward to welcoming you once again in our lovely property!

With Warm Regards,

Deniz Alkan
Assistant Guest Service Manager
owner_response.author: Deniz Alkan

data.text: Hotel is very good , staff is also very good , restaurant ( spice tree ) is very good . Particular staff food and beverage department  MANISHA , AMISHA ,THARUKA AND REME. And chef Anoop.  Indian food is very testy , AND I feel it's like Indian test food.
data.title: Spice tree

data.text:
We stayed one week in this fableous hotel. Everthing was extra ordinary. The flexibilty during our late arrival was a ttemendeous good start of our holiday. The room was super, the top roof swimmingpool is very convenient. The kitchen is preparing good food. 
Overall a hotel which I can highly recomment. The team serving the guest is  excellent.  Special thanks to Manisha  Amisha, Shreya , Benita, Reme, Anesu  Victory and Mu.
8 april 24, mb.mst
data.title: Good experience
